actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Joint resolution to direct the President to initiate immediate negotiations among major arms exporting countries with respect to limiting arms sales, particularly arms sales to Persian Gulf countries.

summary.text: Directs the President to initiate immediate negotiations among major arms exporting countries with respect to limiting arms sales, particularly arms sales to Persian Gulf countries, and other countries in areas of potential conflict. Requires the President to submit to Congress a monthly progress report on such agreement.

titles.title: Joint resolution to direct the President to initiate immediate negotiations among major arms exporting countries with respect to limiting arms sales, particularly arms sales to Persian Gulf countries.
